sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; class CV extends Component { render() { const { data } = this.props; console.log(data); const eduInstitutions = []; const workInstitutions = []; for (let i = 0; i < data.education.counter; i++) { eduInstitutions.push( [

{data.education.institutions[i].name}

,

{data.education.institutions[i].start}

,

{data.education.institutions[i].end}

] ) } return (

{`${data.about.name} ${data.about.surname}`}

{data.about.email}

{data.about.address}

{data.about.phone}

{data.about.description}

{data.education.institutions[0].name}

{data.education.institutions[0].start}

{data.education.institutions[0].end}

{data.experience.institutions[0].name}

{data.experience.institutions[0].position}

{data.experience.institutions[0].start}

{data.experience.institutions[0].end}

{data.extraInfo.skills}

{data.extraInfo.languages}

); } } export default CV;
